channel.title: Posts on Mitchell Ballif
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Mitchell Ballif

item.title: Hello World
item.description:
Welcome to my first post. This site is built with Hugo using the no style, please! theme.

Why no style?

Because content should speak for itself. Minimal CSS means faster load times and a focus on what matters: the writing.

item.title: Second Post
item.description:
This is a second example post to show the posts list in action.

You can add as many posts as you like under content/posts/.
